oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: CIO Unions: The Southern CIO Regional Directors Urge You to Attend Southern CIO School
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pamphlet advertising the Summer CIO School at Highlander, held May 6 - June 2, 1946. The school offered seminars on public speaking, public relations, labor economics, union organizing, labor history, parliamentary law, and political action.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Congress of Industrial Organizations (U.S.); Labor union meetings; Public relations; Communities; Political action committees; Labor laws and legislation; Labor unions; Labor movement; Labor movement--United States--History; Congress of Industrial Organizations (U.S.). Department of Education and Research
